oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-12-17 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from December 17, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer), guest performer Kitty Wells with Bill Phillips, and regular performers Archie Campbell, the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones and Ramona Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1106th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Faron Young; Kitty Wells; Jordanaires; Grandpa Jones; Ramona Jones
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Faron Young introduces Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Faron Young) (recording) -- Faron Young introduces Kitty Wells -- Amigo's Guitar (Kitty Wells, Jordanaires) -- Faron Young introduces Grandpa Jones and Ramona Jones -- Jingle Bells (Grandpa Jones, Ramona Jones) -- Faron Young and Grant Turner talk -- A World So Full Of Love (Faron Young) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Faron Young) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Network announcements -- [re-record of opening, skipless]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States.
